executable.title: Convert binary 1 bit DICOM Segmentation Image into DICOM Labelmap Segmentation Image
executable.description: Convert binary 1 bit DICOM Segmentation Images into DICOM Labelmap Segmentation Images. This only works if the binary segmentation does not have overlaps (checked by the converter).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported in part the National Institutes of Health, National Cancer Institute, Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) program, grant Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) (U24 CA180918, PIs Kikinis and Fedorov).

file.label: SEG file name

file.name: outputSEGFileName
file.label: SEG file name
file.description: File name of the DICOM SEG object that will store the result of conversion.
